frame.name: Avoiding
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> avoids an <fen>Undesirable_situation</fen> under certain <fen>Circumstances</fen>. That situation may be an activity (e.g. going to school), or an entity (perhaps) metonymic for such an activity or situation (e.g. the curb). In this frame, the situation is undesirable from the <fen>Agent</fen>'s point of view (e.g. <ment>evade</ment>), and contrasts with scenes in which the situation is specifically undesirable to someone else (e.g. <ment>forbear</ment>) or from the point of view of an external morality (e.g. <ment>abstain</ment>).
<ex><fex name="Agent">Mike</fex> <t>avoided</t> <fex name="Undesirable_situation">his supervisor</fex> <fex name="Circumstances">at all costs</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> avoids an <fen>Undesirable_situation</fen>. <ex><fex name="Agent">Mike</fex> <t>avoided</t> his supervisor at all costs.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the avoiding occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the avoiding occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Undesirable_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the situation that the <fen>Agent</fen> avoids. <ex>Mike <t>avoided</t> <fex name="Und_sit">his supervisor</fex> at all costs.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which avoiding occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which avoiding occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the <fen>Undesirable_situation</fen> is avoided. <ex>Mike <t>avoided</t> his supervisor <fex name="Circumstances">at all costs</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which avoiding occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> for which avoiding occurs. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: schuwen.v
lexUnit.definition: mijden uit vrees of uit afkeer
